contentrichtext.text: '''ICP''' may refer to: ==Business== * [[International Comfort Products Corporation]], a company that manufactures and markets central air conditioning (HVAC) systems, gas and oil furnaces * [[Indonesian Crude Price]] * [[Imperial College Press]], a London-based publishing house co-founded by [[World Scientific]] and the [[Imperial College of Science, Technology and Medicine]] ==Computing and technology== * [[In-circuit programming]], a method for adding software logic to an integrated circuit after fabrication * [[Internet Cache Protocol]], a protocol used for coordinating web caches * [[Integrated circuit piezoelectric sensor]], a type of piezoelectric accelerometer with built-in microelectronics * Interactive Communications Portal, an [[Avaya]] [[interactive voice response]] (IVR) platform * [[Iterative closest point]], an alignment method for meshes and contours in computer graphics * [[ICP license]] (Internet Content Provider license), a licensing regime for websites operated within the People's Republic of China ==Education== * [[Walt Disney World International College Program]] * [[International Center of Photography]], based in Manhattan, New York City, United States * [[Institut Catholique de Paris]], a Catholic university in Paris, France ==Medical== * [[Intracranial pressure]], is the pressure exerted by the brain, cerebrospinal fluid, and the brain's blood supply on closed intracranial space * [[Intrahepatic Cholestasis of Pregnancy]], a liver disease that causes itching and can cause stillbirth * [[Inferior cerebellar peduncle]], a bundle of myelinated nerve fibers which run bidirectionally from the medulla to the cerebellum * International Council of Psychologists, an international organization of psychologists founded in 1941 ==Music== * [[Insane Clown Posse]], an American music group * ICP Studios, [[recording studio]]s in Brussels * ICP Orchestra, or "Instant Composers Pool", a Dutch jazz and improvised-music ensemble led by [[Misha Mengelberg]], [[Willem Breuker]], and [[Han Bennink]] ==Organizations== * [[International Communist Party]] * [[Iraqi Communist Party]], founded in 1934, Iraq * [[Indochinese Communist Party]], 1930-1945, a predecessor of the Communist Party of Vietnam * [[Immigration Control Platform]], Irish organization * [[Instituto de Cultura PuertorriqueÃ±a]], a government agency in [[Puerto Rico]] ==Science== * [[Inductively coupled plasma]], a type of plasma source in which the energy is supplied by electrical currents * Instituto Clodomiro Picado, a science institute from the [[University of Costa Rica]], well known for its research, and production of [[antivenom]]s {{Disambig}}
